Reviews.Title: not what was expected.
Reviews.Author: Syed M.
Reviews.Content: i bought it for my dad as father's day gift but this cell phone doesn't support t-mobile 4G and the company is not even taking responsibility of returning it. hate this seller.

Reviews.Title: Note 2 N7105 bought at Amazon
Reviews.Author: wizzard
Reviews.Content: Worst seller ever! Only get edge speed in the us, has no warranty and worst return policy ever! All this you can only find out after reading other webpages not linked to on the product sale. To return it (within one month return policy and with complete package) I would loose up to 50% in "restocking fee".Avoid this seller!!!

Reviews.Title: Be aware before buying it
Reviews.Author: Charbel Hajj
Reviews.Content: I received 3 days after the 1rst received item in an order made the same day.It arrived in French, with a FRENCH CATALOG without any English word.All settings were in French.All favourites and links are to some french websites.I spent more than an hour to change all the settings.MORE, I am using a T-Mobile sim card, it doesn't connect 4G in the same places where ALL others have 4G. I went to T-Mobile, they revised it all and said that it may be something wrong wit that international version. They changed the sim card with the same bad results.

Reviews.Title: completely awesome
Reviews.Author: richard hinson
Reviews.Content: first smart phone it is amazing, love the screen, love being able to choose the service provider, and all the emulators.

Reviews.Title: 4g doesn't work in US
Reviews.Author: ULAN K.
Reviews.Content: everything works good, but 4g doesn't work in US, only edge or gprs. I use "Simple mobile". I don't know why it is sell there.

Reviews.Title: I like it so far
Reviews.Author: james
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone last week and so far I don't have issue with it. I like it so far.

Reviews.Title: Expected More
Reviews.Author: março plonski
Reviews.Content: No battery life. It only lasts half a day even o stand by mode.Besides the fact that it was not fare to launch the Galaxy note 3 two months after I bought it.

Reviews.Title: awsome!
Reviews.Author: Peggy W.
Reviews.Content: I use this phone in Canada . It works perfectly on fido network.  The 4G ability on the phone is compatible to fido LTE network. Just need to purchase the LTE SIM.  I love it.  The shipping is fast as well.  It came in a box sealed.  I will recommand this company to friends.  Like!

Reviews.Title: In Prefect conditions...
Reviews.Author: Ericson M.
Reviews.Content: The product got here fast and in a perfect condition... the only problem was that the antenna stopped working after 3 months... i am taking it to the technical assistance tomorrow.

Reviews.Title: iPhone 's Nemesis
Reviews.Author: Gavin Bailey
Reviews.Content: Forget the iPhone!, this is the phone for me.Very Fast!!Large screen!!5G WiFi !!!Grreat Camera!!Smart stylus!!Very Light weight!!Grreat Pictures and Videos!!and much, much more....Get your own and see why I am soooo excited!!!
